biotools.summary: A web server that provides structural alignment of RNA without the help of a reference genome. It takes into account nucleotide sequence similarity, dihedral angle similarity and nucleotide base-pairing similarity.

bioschemas.name: DIAL
bioschemas.summary: A web server that provides structural alignment of RNA without the help of a reference genome. It takes into account nucleotide sequence similarity, dihedral angle similarity and nucleotide base-pairing similarity.
